item.title: wow, a leading member of the kubernetes community made an anti-abortion post? how awful. a fragile reminder to us all that bigots can appear in all our communities. anyway has anyone asked the leaders of the react community on their opinions on reproductive rights?

item.title: RT by @tesseralis: Massachusetts submits HB4930, expected to pass. This bill codifies gender affirming care as a right afforded to Massachusetts citizens. It also provides the ability to counter-sue if providers or patients are sued from out of state entities like Texas abortion bounty hunters.
item.dc:creator: @ErinInTheMorn
item.description: Massachusetts submits HB4930, expected to pass. This bill codifies gender affirming care as a right afforded to Massachusetts citizens. It also provides the ability to counter-sue if providers or patients are sued from out of state entities like Texas abortion bounty hunters.

item.title:
RT by @tesseralis: Upon closer examination I think they egotistically altered the blue stripes in BOTH flags to be the same hues as their logo. They rly said "The blue stripe in the trans flag stands for '-Pal' ☺️" holy shit
And they STILL got the trans order completely wrong... Galaxy brain stuff

item.title: RT by @tesseralis: it seems like our killer feature is one we didn’t really plan on being a differentiator: in-line CSS support. people are committing some Crimes Against Websites on there. there’s a pure html/css warioware minigame. you gotta see this shit. http://cohost.org
item.dc:creator: @jkap
item.description: it seems like our killer feature is one we didn’t really plan on being a differentiator: in-line CSS support. people are committing some Crimes Against Websites on there. there’s a pure html/css warioware minigame. you gotta see this shit. cohost.org
